channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: Violet learns about Mary and Tony from Spratt; Mary tells Violet she plans to wed Tony, but admits to Tom that she has no such intention.

channel.title: Jamie Oliver: Together
channel.desc: Jamie beautifully reimagines steak and chips -- and to top it off, caramelized pineapple tartlets.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: CBC Toronto News
channel.desc: Dwight Drummond and the CBC Toronto News team take a comprehensive look at the day's top stories, with breaking news, live reports and updates relevant to the city of Toronto.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Asha resorts to extreme measures to escape her struggles, and Tim meets an ex-girlfriend.

channel.title: Family Feud Canada
channel.desc: Two families compete to guess the most popular answers to family-friendly survey questions, with a Canadian twist.
